all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
The glory of God is intelligence, or, in other words, light and truth.
Doctrine and Covenants 93:36
Quote of the Day
"While we hold ourselves to the Lord’s high standards, let’s also be patient with one another. We are each a work in progress."
Elder Dieter F. Uchtdorf | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
